result.execSummary:
The defendant Edward A. Gleichauf Jr. was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Edward A. Gleichauf Jr. is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Edward A. Gleichauf Jr. was found guilty of Impersonating a Peace Officer, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.70(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Edward A. Gleichauf Jr.

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: of atty. fees for $377 to atty. Varner

Defendant Edward A. Gleichauf in court with attorney Brent W. Varner.  Dennis Joseph Ryan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Varner states in 14CM119 there is a motion to revoke the DPA.  They are not opposing that motion to revoke.  Also ready to enter a plea in 16CM121 and recs stated.  State is in agreement.  Atty Varner enters NC plea in 16CM121.  DE agrees.  Court questions DE on plea/accepts/finds guilty.  Atty Varner makes statement.  DE makes statement.  Court sentences.

14CM119
90 days jail w/huber consecutive to any other sentence
To commence on or before 9/17/2016 at 6:00 pm
May serve in Dane Co if accepted
EMP approved per jail rules
$543.00 costs/surcharges to be paid w/in 60 days or set up payment plan
Any cash bond to be applied to BOTH cases

16CM121
Ct 1:  NC
Fine/surcharges of $579.00 to be paid w/in 60 days or set up payment plan
DNA sample to be provided
Ct 2:  Dismissed
Return date on July 19, 2016 at 01:00 pm.
